content:
From Grass to Cheese is a feature documentary that chronicles the ups and downs of a family-run dairy farm in Ohio during its first year of cheese production. From Grass to Cheese will tell the story of Nick and Celeste Nolan, their five children, and what itâ€™s like to start up a family farm in the age of industrial agriculture. 
The film is currently seeking support and wants people to become engaged with both the farm and the film project. You can lend support and learn more about the project on its 
.
The documentary filmmakers are rewarding all those that support the project and some supporters can even get cheese straight from the farm.
title: From Grass to Cheese: A Film about Food, Family, and Farming
author: MilkMedia
